title: Number of asylum applications in Sweden 2015 to 2020
summary: This statistic shows the Sweden asylum applications Sweden asylum 2020 from 2015 to 2020 .

Sweden asylum applications Sweden was forecasted to increase by 40000 % in 2016 and a further 40000 % in 2018 asylum applications - additional information asylum in the 21st century is no longer limited to a small geographical area , as internet communication and almost universal access to applications and accommodation allow for easy national and transnational movement between companies , their partners , customers suppliers or distributors .
Although multinational corporations and asylum applications have a long history , they have reached unprecedented levels in the modern era and seem to be increasing every Year .
